summary: An ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 22934 entitled: " An ordinance providing for the laying off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of Orcas Street in the City of Seattle from 24th Avenue South to Rainier Avenue, and providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor and providing for the payment for such improvement be made by special assessment upon property specially benefited, in the manner provided by law" approved January 8,1910.
